enhanced_by.reason: Setting the context is necessary to determine the state of the schema before changing the title.
The old schema state is required to compare and determine if the title has changed.
The new schema state is required to compare and determine if the title has changed.
The isChangeTitle method directly reflects the state set by setChangeTitle, making it ideal for assertions.
The core change status can be influenced by the title change, making it useful for asserting the overall schema change status.
